column2: "Na Kiriat-jearimfo bae bɛfaa EWURADZE n'adakaa no
column3: na wɔdze baa Abinadab fie wɔ koko no do
column4: na wɔtseew ne babanyin Eleazar ho dɛ ɔnhwɛ EWURADZE n'adakaa no do."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ adaka no tsenaa Kiriat-jearim ma ɔkyɛree; na odzii mfe eduonu: na Israel fie nyinara fee EWURADZE."
"Na Samuel kasaa kyerɛɛ Israel fie nyinara dɛ
column3: Sɛ hom dze hom akoma nyinara resan aba EWURADZE hɔ a
column4: ɔno hom nyi enyame ananaben no na Ashtarot no mfi hom mu
column5: na hom nsiesie hom akoma mma EWURADZE
column6: na hom nsom no nko: na ɔbɛgye hom efi Filistiafo nsamu."

column2: "Nna Israelmba yiyii Baal no nyinara na Ashtarot no wɔ hɔ

column3: Hom mboaboa Israel nyinara ano nkɔ Mizpa
column4: na monsɔr memma EWURADZE mma hom."

column7: Yɛayɛ bɔn etsia EWURADZE. Na Samuel buu Israelmba atsɛn wɔ Mizpa."

column2: "Na aber a Filistiafo tsee dɛ Israelmba ekehyia wɔ Mizpa no
column3: Filistiafo mpanyimfo no kɔr Israel do. Na Israel tsee no
Mma nngyaa dɛ ibosu afrɛ EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn ama hɛn
column4: ama ɔaagye hɛn efi Filistiafo nsamu."

column3: na ɔdze no bɔɔ ɔhyew afɔr imu maa EWURADZE: Na Samuel sui frɛɛ EWURADZE maa Israel; na EWURADZE buaa no."

column2: "Na aber a Samuel robɔ ɔhyew afɔr no
column3: Filistiafo no twee pinii dɛ wɔnye Israel robɔko: na EWURADZE maa asenaman paapaa kɛsenara da no guu Filistiafo do

column2: "Na Israel mbarimba no fii Mizpa puei
column4: na wokunkum hɔn araa dze bodur Bɛt-kar ase."

column3: na ɔdze sii Mizpa na Sen ntamu
column4: na ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Ebenezer  kaa dɛ
column5: Ha na EWURADZE aboa hɛn ebodu."
column6: "#7.12 EBENEZER: Asekyerɛ nye dɛ: Mboa bobaa."

column3: na wɔammba Israel he mu bio: na EWURADZE ne nsa daa Filistiafo do wɔ Samuel ne nda nyinara mu."

column2: "Na nkurow a Filistiafo agye no wɔ Israel hɔ nyinara sanee baa Israel hɔ bio
column3: ofi Ekron araa dze kodur Gat; na ne he na Israel gyee fii Filistiafo nsamu. Na amandwee bɛdaa Israel na Amorifo ntamu."

column2: "Na Samuel buu Israel atsɛn no nkwa nda nyinara."
"Na afrenhyia afrenhyia nyinara ɔkɔ kɔbɔ aprɔw wɔ Bɛtɛl
column4: na Mizpa; na obu Israel atsɛn wɔ mbea nyinara do."

column3: na hɔ na ne fie wɔ; na hɔ na osiesiee Israelmba no hɔn ntamu asɛm: na osii afɔrmbukyia wɔ hɔ maa EWURADZE."
